divs: Sighting Detailsfishing in dousman with 3 friends and saw reddish glowing object. went up to road, grabbed binoculars and shortly after disappeared
trends: There has been one other sighting in Dousman
There were no other sightings in Dousman on or around July 2nd 2013
Summary: glowing, reddish orb that hovered for approx 2-3 min before slowly fading out of sight
